original_text: And we are his witnesses of these things; and so is also the Holy Ghost, whom God hath given to them that obey him.
korean_text: 우리는 이 일에 증인이요 하나님이 자기에게 순종하는 사람들에게 주신 성령도 그러하니라 하더라

sentences.original_text: And we are his witnesses of these things
and so is also Holy Ghost
whom God hath given to them
